about.textAboutMe: I am a stubborn and motivated to develop my skills and abilities to grow professionally. Highly responsible individual with strong analytical skills. I am ready to take new challenges, not afraid to learn, improve and get new knowledge. I have sound knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Look forward to improving my skills.

experience.title: Project: № 1
experience.tools: HTML5, Scss, React, Redux, Formik, Axios, Styled-Components, Git
experience.responsibilities: Creating new input fields, creating and refactoring validation of input fields. Creating new components and adding logic. Working with BE, updating styles, fixing bugs.

experience.responsibilities: Code refactor by task. Customize styling on different pages and components. Making changes to the logic of existing components. Interaction with BE.

experience.title: Project: № 3

experience.title: Project: № 4 (current)

experience.responsibilities: I customized the MUI theme and changed types. I customized i18-next. Created a landing page, login page, profile page. Created private routing, standard and Google authorization logic, set up interceptors. Created some shared components for use in forms. Interaction and problem solving with BE.
